title: Muteki-kyuu*Believer / Mirai Harmony
synopsis: Animated music video for Nijigasaki High School Idol Club's first song of their first single titled Muteki-kyuu*Believer sung by Kasumi Nakasu and Nijigasaki High School Idol Club's second song of their first single titled Mirai Harmony sung by the entire Nijigasaki High School Idol Club.
related_anime: ['Love Live! Nijigasaki Gakuen School Idol Doukoukai']

voices: ['Tanaka, Chiemi', 'Kusunoki, Tomori', 'Kitou, Akari', 'Sagara, Mayu', 'Oonishi, Aguri', 'Maeda, Kaori', 'Murakami, Natsumi', 'Kubota, Miyu', 'Sashide, Maria']
